Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /* -*- mode: c++; -*- */
2 
5 #include <cmath>
6 
7 #include "map_store_circle.h"
8 
9 namespace mapstore {
10 
11 MapStoreCircle::MapStoreCircle(double x, double y, double radius)
12 : origin_x(x)
13 , origin_y(y)
14 {
15  // Only examine bottom half of quadrant 1, then apply symmetry 8 ways
16  for (Point pt(0, 0); pt.x <= radius; pt.x++, pt.y = 0)
17  {
18  for (; pt.y <= pt.x && pt.square() <= radius * radius; pt.y++)
19  {
20  points.insert(pt);
21  points.insert(Point(-pt.x, pt.y));
22  points.insert(Point(pt.x, -pt.y));
23  points.insert(Point(-pt.x, -pt.y));
24  points.insert(Point(pt.y, pt.x));
25  points.insert(Point(-pt.y, pt.x));
26  points.insert(Point(pt.y, -pt.x));
27  points.insert(Point(-pt.y, -pt.x));
28  }
29  }
30  iter = points.begin();
31 }
32 
33 bool MapStoreCircle::nextCell(int &x, int &y)
34 {
35  if (iter != points.end())
36  {
37  x = lround(origin_x + iter->x);
38  y = lround(origin_y + iter->y);
39  iter++;
40  return true;
41  }
42  else
43  {
44  return false;
45  }
46 }
47 
48 bool MapStoreCircle::Point::operator<(const Point& pt) const
49 {
50  if (square() < pt.square())
51  return true;
52  if (pt.square() < square())
53  return false;
54  if (x < pt.x)
55  return true;
56  if (pt.x < x)
57  return false;
58  return y < pt.y;
59 }
60 
61 }
62
